data.name: Jerry Rice Owns Most Unbreakable Record in NFL History

data.message: So blessed to see him play while growing up. I've seen a lot of great football players, but they will never come close to Jerry Rice. Thanks for the unforgettable moments Jerry and God bless you â¤ï¸#80 #Class #GoNiners #NinersNation

775 receptions, 11,440 yards, 103 TDs and 2 Super Bowl rings. Thats a Hall of Fame career, oh wait, that's Jerry Rice's stats cut in half. That's right, if Rice's stats were split between two players, they both would make the Hall of Fame... G.O.A.T

Love ALL you Jerry Rice fans. I had the pleasure of meeting the GOAT when I was younger during pre-game warm-ups at his last game @ Qualcomm (well, as a 49er). I was wearing his jersey. He signed it. I asked him to score at least two TDs. He did. That day was a home game for the Chargers. The stadium was a sea of red and gold. Probably 70/30 Niner fans over Bolt fans. The entire 4th quarter was full of chants..."Jerry! Jerry! Jerry!" It was awesome.

data.name: Marcus Cromartie Looks to Carry Strong Offseason into Training Camp

data.message: Really not concerned about the Nay-Sayers!! I've been a fan of the Niners since Brent Jones, Tom Rathman, Roger Craig and company. I see the Niners are hard at work and slowly but surely putting the pieces together that will fix the areas we haven't been the strongest in the past at. I'm optimistic and realistic about the future and I think it's very bright! #NinerNation

Seahawks have their boys...and now Graham. But people forget about who the Niners have. On D: A.Smith, Bowman, Lynch, Brooks, Reid, Bethea, Brock, and some mean youngins looking to make a name including our 1st and 2nd picks Armstead and Tartt. I like the defense. Offense looks good too, think about it: Kaep, Hyde, Hayne, Bush, Boldin, VD, T. Smith, B. Miller, plus we still have 3 of 5 starting offensive lineman with some up and comers gunning to get in there and smack someone. Don't worry, everyone. This year might not be the 6th ring, but the Niners will surprise some folks, I do believe. Watch it happen.
